blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
James: I know we've always had this unspoken rivalry —
Severus: Not a rivalry, you're just always rude to me. And not unspoken,...
body:
James: I know we've always had this unspoken rivalry —
Severus: Not a rivalry, you're just always rude to me. And not unspoken, you talk about it all the time.

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: I know we've always had this unspoken rivalry —

dialogue.name: Severus
dialogue.label: Severus:
dialogue.phrase: Not a rivalry, you're just always rude to me. And not unspoken, you talk about it all the time.

title: Update 18/9/18
body:
my stories lately have been… troubling. I’ve started, stopped, restarted and thrown out many ideas over the last few months so here’s an update on where everything’s at for all my stories thus far.

starting off- my posted stories!
A Life With Magic- Chapter 4, Pending
Darker Souls- Rewrite in progress. Chapter 13 Pending (not sure where that ones going but i’m not ready to give up on it)
Isn’t this ment to be Impossible?- Chapter 3 ready for edits. Chapter 4 in progress.
Chat Box Mayhem- Chapter 3…???? its somewhere.

and now, Unposted. this is gonna get long guys since im gonna be adding mini discriptions.
Divinity- Voldemort wins but the public is still against him. left with no other choice he sets out of gain teh favor of an Angel, the lighest being her could find. unforunately for him the only angel around is a young man abused by people all his life… and he wont be easy to convince. Harry/Diary!Tom
A Divine Kind of Dark- Master of Death Harry is sent back to his original realm to entertain death and keep magicals safe from muggle hands. his first stop? making sure Voldemort doesn’t cause a scene. he probably should have considered the repercusions of giving the man a decent body back… but hey, hey has a cute crystal fox so- what could go wrong? (this one is actually going really well)
So much for diplomatic talks- honestly i dont know where im going with this. the title is a work in progess and the rough idea is Kitsune-person Harry Potter leaves the wizarding would flat on their backs when he does whatever the hell he wants. even Voldemort is at a loss of what to do.
Ice Skating AU. idk yet. i just want to write something with ice skating. blame ‘You get what you give’ and Yuri on Ice for this one. but right now i just dont know. leaving it in the air for now.
Hoard- Alisaie is part dragon, unknown to most of the wizarding world and even herself for a time. Over her years at Hogwarts she collects her Hoard…
(basically an excuse to write Dragon!Harry. fight me i actually like this one. its been here through purge after purge but progress is slow)
HeartBeats- You would think, in his time, that Voldemort would have learnt that there is very little a guardian won’t do for their charge when they truly care. So why, did Voldemort continue to go after Harry Potter when he attended 6th year with two children in tow? Simple. He was a fucking Idiot. (Basically Harry adopts two girls and makes a deal with Voldemort to keep them safe. the result… well, it works out for the both of them)
How to Bullshit the System (fake title until i work something out).- Harry Potter was a perfectly normal colledge student. thank you very much. until he was thrown into his 11 year old body and shipped off to magical school.
honestly, if he ever got back to his world. he was going to fucking kill Tom Riddle for writing those rediculous books. as is… well, he’d have to settle for fucking over 'Lord Voldemort’.
Projec; Atlantis- Harry Potter disappeared from the world 17 years ago… in hindsight. hiding by working for the Dark Lord using a new look and name was definity going to bite him in the arse sooner or later. honestly he’s surprised it took this long.
Winging it- Harry Potter runs away from the wizarding world using his anamigus form and ends up at Malfoy Manor. what follows is… well, lets just say he’s winging the situation. because he has long since lost control of this train.Potterverse/MCU
Dark is all i see- Harry Potter didn’t know why or how he ended up as he did. but with a little devil on his shoulder, superpower and magic. who would ever expect him to turn out like a normal teenager? honestly Dumbledore is lucky he didn’t end up a merenary. and really. Voldemort can fuck off. he has bigger things to fry then Dark Lords trying to take over a school…
Glitter and Gold- Diana Potter deveolped an Obscurial at age 5 and Petunia Dursley moved both her and Dudley out of Vernon’s house at age 7. getting an in with the avangers at 14 was luck. getting captured by Voldemort a few days before Thanos fucked over the universe was… annoying.Potterverse/CWDC universe
How to steal a Dark Lord- Wrong-boy-who-lived! Lily raises Harry in france with Leonard Snart. coming back to Britain for the triwizard tornument no ones sure what to think of the Hadrian Snart… a boy who looks rimarkably like Richard Potter. least of all Tom Riddle.
Meta Magic- Harry Potter ends up in the CWDCU. this idea isn’t 100% fleshed out. will see where it goes.there’s more but… they dont have to do with Harry Potter. and im not sure where they’re going to be honest so i think i’ll leave this post here. any of the bolded stories are ones that have made good (aka any) progress in the last month.

blog.name: unfortunate-ally
blog.title: Writing I guess
blog.description: Being an Aries, INFP, chaotic good and Gryffindor says enough about my personality // BG by @jinxthewitch1

title: Hello!
body:
Hi everyone! Welcome to the beginning of my blog! If you’re seeing this, I’ve either just written this post, you’ve stalked me to find this, or I just haven’t posted anything and you stumbled across this account.

Yay?

Anyway, third possibility is more likely, unless I have some others help me co-admin this account (preferably people I can talk to in real life for now) so yeah!! Enjoy my world of literal crap writing~

Oh yeah I should probably also mention my fandoms, uh, though sometimes I’ll write OC x [Insert Character of Your Choice] per request?? Anyway sometimes original content sometimes fanfiction its a bloody writing account I’ll forget within ten days whoot whoot lets go

FANDOMS:

- Percy Jackson + all Rick Riordan books in general

- Mystic Messenger

- Voltron: Legendary Defender

- Boku No Hero Academia/My Hero Academia

- Harry Potter

- idk i’ll add ‘em when I think of 'em

enjoy~

blog.description:
hello I'm 14 werid awkward and loud (but shy :/) girl
I like to write and draw and I write , I love anime or anything geeky and nerdy.
Idk what I'll post maybe some prompts and short stories and stuff about things I like and drawings?
idk :/

summary: lol it 3am and I'm starving but hey drarry ideas.
body:
lol it 3am and I’m starving but hey drarry ideas.

when I first read harry potter is legit read that the Durslys used to take harry out of school and shit. and when I picked the same book again it wasn’t their like I read ir and I’m like tf?

so I thought harry always wrote really messy like kindergarden cause he couldn’t practice much and he mostly learned through books and whatever schooling he did have.

also this may also link to Harry being made fun of it and slight (lots of drarry ) I idea have.

it’s 3am tf am i doing?

blog.name: jennybeanses
blog.title: The Beans
blog.description:
Fantasy author Jennifer Melzer enjoys spinning elements of the fantastic with strands plucked from the heart. She spent most of her life denying the romantic overtones sewn into her fiction, but awoke one more and realized every single tales she'd spun somehow revolved around the heart. She has since given into the whim, spinning yarns woven from heartstrings.

Jennifer is an avid gamer in  her spare time, and has written a vast number of fanfiction in the Elder Scrolls, Witcher and Dragon Age universes under the pseudonym Erica North (http://ericanorth.net).

She currently resides in Northeast Pennsylvania with her husband, daughter and a houseful of dragons she must train regularly to keep them from setting fire to the curtains. Nightly she dreams she is laying on the beach watching stars burst over the Atlantic Ocean.

To learn more visit her official website: http://jennifermelzer.com

title: Imaginary Heroes: Severus Snape
body:
Imaginary Heroes: Severus Snape

I remember reading an interview with J.K. Rowling right around the time The Order of the Phoenix came out in which the interviewer asked Rowling if Professor Severus Snape was truly irredeemable. She said he’d done unforgivable things, that some people are just bad and that’s all there is to it, but even then I knew she wasn’t telling the whole truth about one of my favorite characters in the…

View On WordPress

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: madmagic-comic
blog.description:
Kicked out of the Academy of Magic as a teenager before she could finish her studies in witchcraft, Joy Kaplan is a talentless mess, living a life of expedients in the normal world. Although, the place she choose to live in, is pretty far from normal... 
Updates every TUESDAY & THURSDAY

SUPPORT buy a BOOK:
https://gumroad.com/illuminated

summary:
Cue Charlie and MC glancing at one another.
Charlie: Really? Well, that is awfully dangerous. 
MC: I mean who would be stupid...
body:
Cue Charlie and MC glancing at one another.

Charlie: Really? Well, that is awfully dangerous.

MC: I mean who would be stupid enough to do that.

Charlie: Certainly not us, especially for a regular hobby.

MC: Yes, and I am certainly not planning on returning very soon and dive into a Red Cap’s hole.

Charlie: Yes.

MC: This is the case.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: Does anyone else think that Tonks and Lupin are the most underappreciated ship? When it comes to Wolfstar it’s not that I don’t...
body:
Does anyone else think that Tonks and Lupin are the most underappreciated ship?

When it comes to Wolfstar it’s not that I don’t like it, I support it. It’s just something I personally have never gotten into it.

I just think Lupin and Tonks are so pure and it makes me so sad that there’s not more fanart and fanfics about them.
